abstract: Alan Arbesfeld scores his fourth score of crosswords.
snippet: Alan Arbesfeld scores his fourth score of crosswords.
lead_paragraph: SUNDAY’S PUZZLE — Alan Arbesfeld, who on 79 previous occasions has graced The Times with one of his crosswords, evens out that number with today’s offering. It’s a simple concept that works nicely — the first letter of a phrase is moved one to the right in the alphabet.
